Content: A court order has been made to arrest Justice Thilina Gamage, who had failed to comply with an earlier order passed by Colombo Chief Magistrate Gihan Pilapitiya. The Colombo Chief Magistrate had ordered him to give a statement to the CID.The former Colombo Additional Magistrate, who faces charges including the illegal possession of an elephant calf without a valid license was sent on compulsory leave last month.
